text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: It's Fukushima! !

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha…… so happy about traveling 
is she an elementary school student? 
But Trainer, why Fukushima?
choice_data_list:
Because there are many places where you can train 
while playing.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I see. There are mountains, valleys and lakes. 
On top of that, there is even the Fukushima Racecourse. 
You can just let her run anywhere as she please…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! Nature! Let's play! 
There are so many things Turbo want to do!!

Like a squirrel unleashed into the wild. 
Twin Turbo ran around the sightseeing 
spots as fast as she could.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa… these stone steps are long～～～! 
No matter how much I climb, I never reach the top. but……!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
GO～AL!! Ah, Trainer, I can see the castle! 
Hey, castle!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha…… Come to think of it, a long time ago 
I heard that the young samurai realized their 
defeat when they saw the castle burning from here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's not the point! Running nearly 200 stone 
steps up all at once… Trainer-san?

When Twin Turbo wish to run, no matter how harsh 
it is she won't hate it. No, rather…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ha～a, ha～a, ha～a, ha～a…… Ahahahahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: It hurt, my breath… my breath is… haaah, ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san…… doesn't it look like 
she is having fun instead?

Far from disliking it, it look like she enjoy 
the suffering. No, it's not just look like…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Not yet… I can still go. Turbo does not burn out! 
My heart is bursting! I will keep going until I collapse!!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!! 
It's painful! It's so fun! Ahahahaha…!

By letting her run as she pleases to the limit, 
I realized. The greatest duality of the twin turbo. It is―
S but - M!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Trainer-san!???? What is it so suddenly!?
choice_data_list: No, maybe she actually like it when it's painful.
Yes, maybe she actually like it when it's painful.

text_block_list.text:
If it's in the pain that she chose herself, she can 
push on to the end. You can even say that 
she is seeking for that pain.

This Fukushima training camp was a big hint. 
Now we only need to apply this to race.
One day―

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
It's been a while since I've done a mock race…… 
I wonder if it's ok.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I was just playing around with Trainer and Nature. 
If I get riled up again just like before…
choice_data_list: Listen up Turbo, here's today's plan.

text_block_list.text:
The way to go has been decided. 
There is no reason to hesitate anymore.
choice_data_list: Once you get out of the gate, just run!
Once you leave the gate, just run!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Eh, run away… is that really okay? 
That's how I lost before……
choice_data_list:
Today you are competing with yourself. Let's burn it all 
completely

Today you are competing with yourself. Let's burn it all 
completely

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Burn it all completely……! Competing with myself…!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
yes! If it's like that Turbo can do it! I want to do it! 
All right let's run, run, run, and burn completely!!

The fact that she running around at full speed should 
have improved her breathing capability. The only 
thing left is to see how far she can immerse herself.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh… Twin Turbo, is it another great escape this time too? 
is it going to be like the other day…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Let's go, let's go, let's go. Turbo Full throttle! 
Ta～aaaaaaaaaaa!

At first glance, it's the same as before, but this time 
it's different. Twin turbo escapes on her own accord. 
And this is where the real highlight begin!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Haa……Haa……No more……I can't do it～. 
but……!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I'll go as far as I can…! 
Turbo is… Turbo is still… not burnt out～～～! !

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Final straight line! Well, as expected they are 
caught up… But the gap is bigger than last time! 
And most of all――

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I will… RUUUUN!! Hahahahaa!!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: It looks like a lot of fun!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
She won!! 
Just barely, but until the very end!!

A truly throwaway goal. I rushed over 
to the twin-turbo that had completed 
the form of victory.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Huh huh… oeghhh…

She fell down with her face planted to the ground. I couldn't 
understand what she was saying. But she finally lay down on her 
back and said one word which I heard clearly.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh～, that was fun…!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Teio!! 
Did you see Turbo race!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
In the Twinkle series, I'll escape from you! 
Hehe, were you scared!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
…I have to do my best, for the sake of Legend of Teio. 
First goal is "Satsuki-shō"!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Oi you didn't see it!? Listen Teio!! 
Listen to me～!!

――It seems like there is still a long time until 
her lifelong rival Tokai Teio notice her. But…

Surprise your rivals and fans with this outrageous escape. 
Yes, until she burns her everything.
